short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tame the Chat Chaos: Organize ChatGPT Conversations

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Feeling overwhelmed by your AI chats? Struggling to find past conversations with ChatGPT? Cleanest AI brings order to the chaos.

This powerful Chrome extension lets you:

- Organize chats into folders: Create custom folders for different topics, projects, or AI models.
- Effortless filing: Drag and drop your chats into the appropriate folders for easy access.
- Search through chats to find them easily.
- Goodbye, endless scrolling: Say goodbye to endlessly scrolling through your chat history. Find what you need quickly with clear folder organization.
- Focus on what matters: Boost your productivity by keeping your conversations organized and readily available.
